8290686.title: Cave lion
8290686.extract: Cave lions are large extinct carnivorous felids that are classified either as subspecies of the lion (Panthera leo) or as distinct but closely related species, depending on the authority.

740205.title: Chinese guardian lions
740205.extract: Chinese guardian lions or Imperial guardian lions, traditionally known in Chinese simply as Shi (Chinese: 獅; pinyin: shī; literally: "lion"), and often called "Foo Dogs" in the West, are a common representation of the lion in pre-modern China.

2339219.title: Eagle-Lion Films
2339219.extract: Eagle-Lion Films was a British film production company owned by J.

36896.title: Lion
36896.extract: The lion (Panthera leo) is one of the five big cats in the genus Panthera and a member of the family Felidae.

42835190.title: Lion (disambiguation)
42835190.extract: The lion is a big cat of the species Panthera leo that inhabits the African continent and one forest in India.

1983509.title: Lion taming
1983509.extract: Lion taming is the taming and training of lions, either for protection, or more commonly, entertainment, particularly in the circus.

201485.title: Lithium-ion battery
201485.extract: A lithium-ion battery (sometimes Li-ion battery or LIB) is a member of a family of rechargeable battery types in which lithium ions move from the negative electrode to the positive electrode during discharge and back when charging.

161302.title: Napier Lion
161302.extract: The Napier Lion was a 12-cylinder broad arrow configuration aircraft engine built by Napier & Son starting in 1917, and ending in the 1930s.

20834020.title: The Lion (mountain)
20834020.extract: The Lion is a mountain in South West Tasmania.

88678.title: The Lion King
88678.extract: The Lion King is a 1994 American animated epic musical film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and released by Walt Disney Pictures.
